item.dc:creator: @TimmahPwnz TimmahPwnz
item.description:
@TimmahPwnz wrote:

I Just Need A Template The Biggest One I Can Find Was


class80.aRSString_1466 = Class112.method1668(43, "War Beast");//Name
class80.anInt1444 = 785;//combat level
class80.aBoolean1438 = true;//show yellow dot?
class80.anInt1439 = 0;//Set Headicon ID
class80.aBoolean1433 = true;//allow rightclicking?
class80.aRSStringArray1432[1] = Class112.method1668(43, "Attack");
//class80.anInt1461 = 50;//resize width
//class80.anInt1416 = 50;//resize height
//class80.anInt1409 = 1232;//stand animation
//class80.anIntArray1454 = new int[1];//model count
//class80.anIntArray1454[0] = 2937;//model 1

and also if there were a // body or something on the end, it would be greatly appreciated.

  • Tim
